title.rendered: OneTouch Health is exhibiting at the Leaders in Care Conference 2024

content.rendered:
OneTouch Health is exhibiting at the Leaders in Care Conference 2024

When: 🗓 29th May

Where: 📍One Moorgate Place, London.

Representing OneTouch Health on the day will be Steve Ellerington and Rachel Jarvis 👋

If you are attending the conference be sure to stop by and say hello to our industry experts who will be able to discuss the benefits of implementing OneTouch Health in to your business 💻 ✅

Not able to attend? You can reach out to our sales team to book a demonstration of the OneTouch platform, sales@onetouchhealth.net 📩

excerpt.rendered: OneTouch Health is exhibiting at the Leaders in Care Conference on the 29th of May!
